content:
As an AI language model, I cannot specifically recommend any e-commerce platform, but I can provide general information about commonly used and popular e-commerce platforms that are known for their user-friendliness and ease of use, including:

1. Shopify: Shopify is one of the most popular e-commerce platforms globally, with a user-friendly interface and a drag-and-drop tool that makes creating an online store easy.

2. WooCommerce: WooCommerce is a flexible and popular e-commerce plugin for WordPress websites, and it offers an array of templates and customization options.

3. BigCommerce: BigCommerce is a cloud-based e-commerce platform that offers simplicity and scalability without needing any coding skills.

4. Magento: Magento is a popular e-commerce platform for larger businesses that offers a wide range of customization options and advanced features.

5. Squarespace: Squarespace e-commerce platform is known for its user-friendly interface, customizable templates, and web design options.

When choosing an e-commerce platform, it is essential to ensure that it suits your business needs in terms of scalability, features, customization, and support.
